startingMods.description: on dealing dmg, target gets -1 dmg res for combat

thematicMods.description: 7. on KB, +2 dmg with DEX-based hits for combat

startingMods.description: on wep hit, target makes CON save or diseased with daze until CON save

thematicMods.description: 10. 1/SR, as action, summon clone of yourself as CR 1/4 minion. Atks with dmg type of your choice of one of your weps or cantrips. Looks identical to you, and Nature/Percep checks required to identify which is real
4. on wep hit, target makes CON save or psn'd until CON save
5. on wep hit, target makes CON save. on sub fail, uncon until dmg'd/shaken
6. as action, touch creature to learn its current emotional state + it makes CHA save or you also learn its alignment. Celestials/fiends/undead auto fail save
7. as action, turn invis (conc) until atk/cast

startingMods.description: 1/combat per target, on buff, target gains +10' sp until end of your next turn
1/combat per target, on buff, target gains +2 global dmg until end of your next turn

thematicMods.description: 2. your buffs on you have double duration
3. +2 dmg with effects you are concentrating on
4. 20% chance on using a cooldown buff to refund its cooldown
9. 1/combat per target, on buff, target gains +1 spell crit range until end of your next turn

startingMods.description: on hit, 20% chance to debil target until end of their next turn

thematicMods.description: 6. 20% chance to nullify extra dmg from crits
9. 1/turn, when hit, 20% chance to heal 3 HP
10. 1/turn, when hit, 20% chance to gain +3 incoming healing until the end of your next turn

startingMods.description: +1d4 fire dmg to your minion melee hits
your undead minions have +1d4 dmg to their hits of a type equal to your highest non-phys res (can have multiple)

thematicMods.description: 3. on undead minion hit, 20% chance for you to heal 2 HP
4. +1d4 S dmg to your minion melee hits
6. your undead minions have +1d4 dmg to their melee hits of a type equal to your highest non-phys res (can have multiple)

startingMods.description: on init while in water, you may move up to 2 creatures within the same body of water to an unoccupied space adj to you

thematicMods.description: 2. you can perform long/high jumps from water
4. on minion hit, they heal 1 HP
5. every 3 of your turn starts across combats, erupt in a burst of water which has no effect if you are submerged in earth or water. Attack all adj creatures, dealing 1d4 B wep dmg on hit
6. +1 crit range for journey activity checks
7. during the first rnd of combat while in water, +6 wep dmg
8. wep hits increase resulting concentration save DCs by 1
10. +20' swim sp while moving towards marked creatures

startingMods.description: on wep hit, target loses 1 buff
on non-dmging power use, recover 1 exertion
on buffing an ally, gain an additional bonus action for this turn

thematicMods.description: 1. +10% to item proc chances to trigger from limited features
3. on limited feature use, -8 NPC ally effectiveness this rnd; 2pts distributed
4. on wep hit, 20% chance to give -1 dmg res until CON save
5. as bonus, can refresh a 1/min cooldown on an ally within 60'
6. as action, can use a bonus action already made this turn
7. on wep hit, target gets -1 dmg res until CON save
8. on wep hit, target becomes unbuffable until end of your next turn
9. on single-target hit, target gets -1 dmg res until CON save
10. on single-target hit, target gets -1 to saves vs debuffs until end of your next turn

startingMods.description: on dealing dmg with an illusion spell, inflict 1 psy DoT, stacking until WIS save
on psy DoT tick, if the target hasn't displaced distance since the start of their last turn, the DoT deals +3 dmg
+1d4 fire dmg to your wand hits

thematicMods.description: 1. on wand hit, inflict 1 fire DoT, stacking until DEX save
4. +1 to your non-dmging illusion spell DCs
5. your non-instantaneous illusion spells last for +1 duration step
6. buffs applied to illusory images of you are instead applied to you
thematicMods.upgrade: +1 effectiveness of buffs on illusory images of you/2

thematicMods.description: 7. on creating an illusion, +1 global dmg for combat
8. on successfully hiding, also conjure an illusory image of yourself as per the Silent Image spell
10. on creating an illusory image, +1 global dmg until end of your next turn

startingMods.description: as action, you can send pulsing waves of ethereal energy in a 60' cone, forcing creatures within to make a CON save or take 2d12 force spell dmg
whenever you deal force spell dmg to a creature's image of itself, you dmg the original creature instead
whenever you deal force spell dmg to a possessed creature, you instead dmg the possessing entity

thematicMods.description: 1. whenever you deal force spell dmg to an obj or struct with a creature literally inside it, you instead dmg the creature
2. -4 force spell dmg vs constructs; 2pts distributed
5. +3 spell dmg vs creatures' images of themselves
7. your non-dmging Illusion spells can target 1 additional target in range
9. +3 spell dmg vs targets currently possessing another creature
1. +1 to your DC with the Disarm maneuver
3. +1 basic dmg with the Disarm maneuver
5. on wep hit, 20% chance to silence target until end of your next turn

startingMods.description: on glyphic hit, target pushed 5' away from you

thematicMods.description: 2. on teleport, 20% chance to release a sonic boom at your origin, a glyphic atk against all foes adj to your origin dealing 1d4 thunder dmg
3. on teleport, 20% chance to release a sonic boom at your destination, a glyphic atk against all foes adj to your destination dealing 1d4 thunder dmg
4. on glyphic hit, 20% chance to silence target until end of your next turn
8. on P hit, inflict 1 psn DoT, stacking until CON save
9. creatures affected by your DoTs are slowed

startingMods.description: allies within 60' of you have +5' sp when moving toward foes

thematicMods.description: 1. on turn start, choose a creature within 15' of you to have -1 to debuff saves until your next turn
2. on melee hit, choose a creature armed with a melee wep within 15' of you and roll a d6. On a 6, one of their melee weps of your choice gets -1 AB for combat. Can only be done once per wep.
3. +1 wep dmg for each foe in 60'
4. 1/combat, when hit, a spectral copy of your wep/its projs spiral around you, making a glyphic atk against all adj foes dealing 1d4 light dmg
6. on turn start, if you haven't displaced distance since start of your last turn, get -5' sp until you either teleport or combat ends; 3pts distributed
7. +3 wep dmg per 5' below 30' your sp is
8. +2 dmg res per 5' below 30' your sp is
9. on turn start, choose a creature within 50' of you to have +1 melee dmg until end of their next turn

startingMods.description: whenever an adj creature dies, you raise their corpse as a Frozen Thrall, a CR 1/8 undead minion that deals cold dmg
foes starting their turns adj to your undead minions are slowed

thematicMods.description: 1. on undead minion hit, the minion explodes and dies, making a spell atk against all adj foes that deals 1d4 cold dmg
3. on spell hit, target is slowed until end of your next turn
5. after your projs pierce a target, they become 5' wider in a direction of your choice
9. on spell hit, target rooted until end of your next turn

startingMods.description: your line AoEs now create 5x5' pers areas beneath a creature of your choice within range equal to the line's length

whenever you create a pers area, choose a creature for it to follow. At the start of your turn, the area moves the smallest amount such that the creature is inside it. When it moves through other creatures it counts as them entering its area

thematicMods.description: 1. your pers areas deal +2 dmg during their first rnd of existence
2. your buff powers that target a single creature now instead target an empty space, granting the buff to all allies (including you) adj to the space
8. you ignore penalties from wind-based weather on your journey activities
thematicMods.upgrade: +1 to journey activity checks in wind-based weather/3

thematicMods.description: 9. your pers areas deal -3 dmg to allies
10. your minions have +3 dmg res during their first rnd of existence

startingMods.description: on turn start, foes within 10' get -1 wep dmg res until end of their next turn

6. if you have 15+ INT, your construct minions have +1 DEX mod

startingMods.description: on melee hit, 30% chance to refund the non-cooldown resource cost of your next limited feature

thematicMods.description: 1. on melee hit, 20% chance to give your next melee hit +3 dmg

4. on basic melee wep hit, target gets 1 S DoT, stacking until CON save
